mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_APPLICATION_BALANCECROSS_VAR ( T_APPLICATION_BALANCECROSS_VAR.BALANCE_CORSS_VAR_ID, T_APPLICATION_BALANCECROSS_VAR.APPLICATION_ID ) SELECT TBCV.BALANCE_CROSS_VAR_ID, #{application} APPLICATION_ID FROM T_APPLICATION_TEMPLATE_GROUP TATG, T_BANLANCE_CROSS_VAR TBCV WHERE TATG. GROUP_ID = TBCV.BALANCE_CROSS_VARGROUP_ID AND TATG.TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId}
